message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm looking to make a deal. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While $12,000 represents a fair price for its value, I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to move things along. This offer reflects my bottom line.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. However, I am still aiming to keep my spending within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $10,000 for the product?
